template.name: exportfs

parameter.name: id
parameter.longdesc: Unique ID for this export in the cluster.

parameter.name: fsid
parameter.longdesc: Unique NFS file system identifier. The root file system ID must be 0.

parameter.name: directory
parameter.longdesc: The mount point for the filesystem, e.g.: /srv/nfs/home

parameter.name: options
parameter.longdesc: Any additional options to be given to the mount command, for example "rw,mountpoint"

parameter.name: wait_for_leasetime_on_stop
parameter.shortdesc: Wait for lease time on stop
parameter.longdesc: If set to true, wait for lease time on stop.

template.crm_script:
primitive ocf:heartbeat:exportfs params fsid="" directory=""
options=""
clientspec=""
wait_for_leasetime_on_stop=
op monitor interval="30s"
